Hexo Trial

Playground
2018-03-25

While I was browsing vuejs blog, I came across it’s source code. It was using hexo which looked pretty easy and had some pretty themes to finally start my own blog.

I will putting this on trial and if I like this much, I will start adding some tech blog posts over here, something I have learnt in the past week. Cool way for me to actually catch up with my learnings and perhaps, life as well!
